Name: MPI_Cart_shift
Description: MPI_Cart_shift virtually moves the cartesian topology of a communicator (created with MPI_Cart_create) in the dimension specified. It permits to find the two processes that would respectively reach, and be reached by, the calling process with that shift. Shifting a cartesian topology by 1 unit (the displacement) in a dimension therefore allows a process to find its neighbours in that dimension. In case no such neighbour exists, virtually located outside the boundaries of a non periodic dimension for instance, MPI_PROC_NULL is given instead.

Parameters.Name: direction
Parameters.Description: The index of the dimension in which the shift will be made.

Parameters.Name: displacement
Parameters.Description: The number of units by which virtually move the topology.

Parameters.Name: source
Parameters.Description: The variable in which store the rank of the process that, given this shift, would reach the calling process. In case no such process exists, which may occur when the dimension traversed by the shift is not periodic, MPI_PROC_NULL is stored instead.

Parameters.Name: destination
Parameters.Description: The rank of the process that, given this shift, would be reached by the calling process. In case no such process exists, which may occur when the dimension traversed by the shift is not periodic, MPI_PROC_NULL is stored instead.

Return.Description:
The error code returned from the coordinates shift.

  • MPI_SUCCESS: the routine successfully completed.
